536880.name: Runeyana Demo
536880.description:
Runeyana is set in a deep, responsive and huge world.
In Runeyana you will explore a beautiful sprawling land gaining the trust of various species scattered throughout the world and the internal racial tensions by earning their trust through reputation. There are many unique features in the game, unique weapons, crafting and deep character customisation. It follows the story of bravery, strength, courage, trust and the desire to overcome any odds.
536880.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
